name: Golden Daffodil
description: A quiet sunrise captured in petals — gentle, hopeful, and full of new beginnings.

name: Lavender Aster
description: Delicate yet confident, it feels like a soft memory blooming under open skies.

name: White Gardenia
description: Pure silence in floral form — calm, graceful, and effortlessly timeless.

name: Blush Orchid
description: Elegant and intimate, like a whispered emotion held gently in light.
